Title: Chairman Mao's writings sparkle like gold
Designer: Zhu Yuanqing (朱源清)683 Car Transport Pool (六八三汽车运输场)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: The large book cover on the stage is Volume 5 of the Selected Works of Mao Zedong (Mao Zedong xuanji - 毛泽东选集).
Theme: Song & DanceSelected Works of Mao Zedong Volume V
